column4: ok, just installed ubuntu...never used linux before. installation from the cd is done, booting from disk for the first time. I provide login and pword, and then have to write a command it seems...how do I get in to the "real thing" with a desktop and stuff?
its like dos
you have to type something
doesnt work
no, I dont have a graphical interface
try sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
!tell zytrax about root
it says xserver-xorg is broken or not fully installed
hrm, no error messages during the install?
yes, thats true...after installing from cd....the rebooting started installing extra packages and that didnt work out for some reason....how do I retry that installation?
yes a problem with installing extra packages stuff after the normal cd installation was finished
so how do I retry the last part of the installation? the cd just starts from the beginning again
that's a valid question
hehe
do you have network connectivity? does ping google.com
only have one network plug, using it for this machine =)
only have one network plug, using it for this machine =)
ill try the cd again, but skipping the first steps this time
I'm not sure if the install process wouldn't start if you simply reboot the other box
tried rebooting
thanks anyway....Ill try to install over again
